DOC.brief_summary: Develop and evaluate a model of organization and management in the management of patients with cardiovascular risk factors (hypertension, diabetes mellitus, smoking, obesity, physical inactivity, dyslipidemia and family history) in primary care aimed at the compliance, control and treatment effectiveness.
